local_intent: Perceive the T-block, then approach and align to it with tight lateral tolerance, and verify pose achieved.
assumptions: t_block becomes visible after raster scan if initially occluded
Robot can kinematically reach the approach pose
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase: perception fallback, precise ApproachAndAlign (tolerance 0.005, 1500 ms), and verification before contact and pushing, matching the GLOBAL_BT and description.
